name: YouTube-Download
description: A bot that can download video or audio from any website.

APP_ID.description: Your APP ID from of my.telegram.org

AUDIO_THUMBNAIL.description: If you need to use custom thumbnail for audio files, get telegraph url of your thumbnail using @JETelegraphBot and put here. If not keep No

VIDEO_THUMBNAIL.description: If you need to use custom thumbnail for video files, get telegraph url of your thumbnail using @JETelegraphBot and put it here. If not keep No
